alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 18 at 2:43AM EST until December 19 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 degrees possible. * WHERE...In Florida, Inland Nassau County. In Georgia, Inland Glynn and Inland Camden Counties. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.
